answer: <p>Whould <a href="http://www.quirksmode.org/js/this.html" rel="nofollow noreferrer">this</a> help? (Most confusion of 'this' in javascript is coming from the fact that it generally is not linked to your object, but to the current executing scope -- that might not be exactly how it works but is always feels like that to me -- see the article for a complete explanation)</p>
data.title: How does the "this" keyword work, and when should it be used?
